My security-driven nature urges caution, perhaps property in a less flood-prone sestiere, or a stake in a solid workshop. I need to be resourceful, leverage these ducats and the secrets I still hold to build something lasting, something that gives the Foscari name a bit more weight in this city, even if I started as a simple Facchino. Perhaps a respectable business that serves the nobility, keeping me close to the currents of power and information, but this time as a proprietor, not just an observer. It must be a careful, gradual ascent, turning this gold into genuine standing.
